  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 30

Words 2901-3000

  1. well
    She sings very well in front of the crowd.

  2. west
    The sun sets in the west every evening.

  3. western
    They enjoy watching western movies on weekends.

  4. wet
    Be careful, the floor is wet after the rain.

  5. what
    What is your favorite book to read?

  6. whatever
    You can choose whatever you like from the menu.

  7. wheel
    The wheel of the car needs to be repaired.

  8. when
    When will you visit your grandparents again?

  9. whenever
    Call me whenever you need help with your homework.

  10. where
    Do you know where the nearest library is?

  11. whereas
    She likes tea, whereas he prefers coffee.

  12. wherever
    You can sit wherever you feel comfortable.

  13. whether
    I am not sure whether it will rain today.

  14. which
    Which color do you like better, blue or green?

  15. while
    She listened to music while working on her project.

  16. whisper
    Please whisper if you need to talk in the library.

  17. white
    The walls of the room are painted white.

  18. who
    Who is your best friend at school?

  19. whole
    He ate the whole pizza by himself.

  20. whom
    To whom should I address this letter?

  21. whose
    Whose bag is this on the table?

  22. why
    Can you explain why you missed the meeting?

  23. wide
    The river is very wide at this point.

  24. widely
    This book is widely known for its interesting story.

  25. wife
    His wife is a teacher at the local school.

  26. wild
    They saw wild animals during their trip to the forest.

  27. wildlife
    The park is famous for its rich wildlife.

  28. will
    She will visit her parents next weekend.

  29. willing
    He is willing to help you with your project.

  30. win
    They hope to win the championship this year.

  31. wind1
    The wind is strong today, so hold onto your hat.

  32. wind2
    You need to wind the clock to make it work.

  33. window
    She opened the window to let in some fresh air.

  34. wine
    They served red wine at the dinner party.

  35. wing
    The bird injured its wing and could not fly.

  36. winner
    The winner of the race received a gold medal.

  37. winter
    Winter is my favorite season because of the snow.

  38. wire
    The electrician fixed the broken wire in the house.

  39. wise
    It is wise to save money for the future.

  40. wish
    I wish you a happy and successful year ahead.

  41. with
    She went to the park with her younger brother.

  42. within
    The package will arrive within three days.

  43. without
    He completed the task without any help.

  44. witness
    The witness gave a detailed account of the accident.

  45. woman
    The woman at the counter helped me find the book.

  46. wonder
    I wonder if it will rain tomorrow.

  47. wonderful
    The view from the top of the hill is wonderful.

  48. wood
    The table is made of solid wood.

  49. wooden
    They built a small wooden house near the lake.

  50. wool
    She bought a wool sweater to keep warm in winter.

  51. word
    Can you spell this word for me?

  52. work
    He has a lot of work to finish before the deadline.

  53. worker
    The worker repaired the broken machine quickly.

  54. working
    She is working hard to achieve her goals.

  55. world
    The world is full of amazing places to explore.

  56. worldwide
    This brand is known worldwide for its quality.

  57. worried
    She is worried about her upcoming exams.

  58. worry
    Don’t worry, everything will be fine.

  59. worse
    The weather today is worse than yesterday.

  60. worst
    That was the worst movie I have ever seen.

  61. worth
    This painting is worth a lot of money.

  62. would
    I would like to have a cup of tea, please.

  63. wound
    He cleaned the wound and applied a bandage.

  64. wow
    Wow, this cake tastes amazing!

  65. wrap
    Please wrap the gift before giving it to her.

  66. write
    Can you write your name on this form?

  67. writer
    The writer of this book is very talented.

  68. writing
    She enjoys writing stories in her free time.

  69. written
    The instructions are written clearly on the box.

  70. wrong
    I think you have the wrong address for the meeting.

  71. yard
    The children are playing in the yard.

  72. yeah
    Yeah, I would love to join you for lunch.

  73. year
    This year has been full of exciting events.

  74. yellow
    The yellow flowers in the garden look beautiful.

  75. yes
    Yes, I will help you with your homework.

  76. yesterday
    We went to the museum yesterday afternoon.

  77. yet
    He hasn’t finished his homework yet.

  78. you
    You are my best friend in the whole world.

  79. young
    The young boy is learning how to play the piano.

  80. your
    Is this your book on the table?

  81. yours
    This pen is yours, not mine.

  82. yourself
    You should take care of yourself during the trip.

  83. youth
    The youth of today are full of energy and ideas.

  84. zero
    The temperature dropped to zero last night.

  85. zone
    This area is a no-parking zone.
